title: Brazil's Central Bank Holds Rates Again as Inflation Sticks — Update
description:
By Paulo Trevisani

Brazil's central bank on Wednesday kept its benchmark rate at one of the highest levels in the world for a third consecutive time, as inflation remains above target.

The monetary policy committee, known as Copom, kept its Selic short-term rate at 15% and indicated it could remai...

title: Global South to write 21st century's growth story
description: As the impacts of climate change become more severe with deadly heatwaves, eroding coastlines, rising food prices, and increasing social and economic instability, affected countries, particularly poor ones, are getting concerned about having to slow their development while addressing climate change....

title: MercadoLibre tries to woo Brazil’s online shoppers as Amazon, Shein close in
description:
MercadoLibre Inc has long dominated the online-shopping market in Latin America, but this holiday season, it finds itself in a fight to fend off rivals from both ends of the Pacific Ocean.

On one side, there’s Amazon.com Inc, a global behemoth with seemingly endless resources. On the other, Asian p...

title: Brazil offers lesson in winning in Trump’s economic ‘Taco’ trade style

US president Donald Trump (right) with Brazil's president Lula da Silva of Brazil during a bilateral meeting in Kuala Lumpur in October. Photograph: Haiyun Jiang/The New York Times

title: Trump removes 40pc tariff on Brazilian beef in latest major shift to US trade settings
description:
The United States has this morning (Australian time) formally removed a 40 percent tariff previously imposed on Brazilian beef, in a development that represents another significant shift in US agricultural trade policy.

At one point this year beef sold from Brazil to the US had faced tariff imposts...
